mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES(SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, NULL, #{category}, 'N', TO_DATE(#{boardPeriod},'YYYY-MM-DD'),#{phone},2,#{memberNo},TO_DATE(#{boardPeriod2},'YYYY-MM-DD'),#{profileImage})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, ROWNUM AA FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BOARD_NO FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_ST = 'N' AND BOARD_CD = 2 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ))WHERE AA = 1
SELECT DISTINCT AREA FROM AREA_DB ORDER BY AREA

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATE_DT, AREA, AREA_DETAIL, ANIMAL_TYPE, ANIMAL_DETAIL, GENDER, NEUTERING, CATEGORY, (SYSDATE - CREATE_DT)*24*60*60 AS "DIFF", (SYSDATE - UPDATE_DT)*24*60*60 AS "DIFF2", BOARD_PERIOD, BOARD_PERIOD2, THUMBNAIL,PROFILE_IMG, CASE WHEN UPDATE_DT IS NULL THEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DT)*24*60*60 ELSE (SYSDATE - UPDATE_DT)*24*60*60 END NUM FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD_AREA USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN BOARD_ANIMAL USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_CD = 2 AND BOARD_ST = 'N' ORDER BY NUM

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATE_DT, AREA, AREA_DETAIL, PHONE, ANIMAL_TYPE, ANIMAL_DETAIL, GENDER, NEUTERING, CATEGORY, MEMBER_NO, TO_CHAR(BOARD_PERIOD,'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_PERIOD, TO_CHAR(BOARD_PERIOD2,'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_PERIOD2, THUMBNAIL, PROFILE_IMG FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD_AREA USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN BOARD_ANIMAL USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ${boardNo}
SELECT ANIMAL_DETAIL FROM ANIMAL_DB WHERE ANIMAL_TYPE = #{animalType}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_ST = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
UPDATE BOARD_AREA SET AREA = #{area}, AREA_DETAIL = #{areaDetail} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LIKE_DB WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATE_DT, CASE WHEN UPDATE_DT IS NULL THEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DT)*24*60*60 ELSE (SYSDATE - UPDATE_DT)*24*60*60 END NUM FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CD = 2 AND BOARD_ST = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY NUM
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKE_DB WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATE_DT, ANIMAL_TYPE, ANIMAL_DETAIL, GENDER, NEUTERING, CATEGORY, (SYSDATE - CREATE_DT)*24*60*60 AS "DIFF", (SYSDATE - UPDATE_DT)*24*60*60 AS "DIFF2", THUMBNAIL,PROFILE_IMG FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD_ANIMAL USING(BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD_AREA USING(BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN LIKE_DB USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_CD = 2 AND BOARD_ST = 'N' AND BOARD_NO IN(SELECT BOARD_NO FROM LIKE_DB WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) ORDER BY BOARD_WISH_NO DESC
